amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop literacy standards for informational materials, particularly drug information.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 954 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 954 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S8422; text: CR S8422) To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop literacy standards for informational materials, particularly drug information.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 954 proposed by Senator Clinton.
